resources.string: Thank you for choosing Fragments, this wizard will install Fragments in your device. Do not restart or turn-off your device while the wizard is installing Fragments. You may start by clicking on the Start Button!
Fragments is installing, please wait this could take a couple of seconds
The Installation is complete!. Please proceed to the final step by clicking on the Next Button.
Congratulations you now have Fragments installed in your device. That\'s all you may finish this wizard by clicking on Exit Button.
